MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Android.OS.Bundle AddAccount (Android.Accounts.AccountAuthenticatorResponse response, string accountType, string authTokenType, string[] requiredFeatures, Android.OS.Bundle options);

Docs.param: to send the result back to the AccountManager, will never be null
the type of account to add, will never be null
the type of auth token to retrieve after adding the account, may be null

a Bundle of authenticator-specific options, may be null

the account to clone, will never be null
the Bundle containing the required credentials to create the account. Contents of the Bundle are only meaningful to the authenticator. This Bundle is provided by .
Docs.summary: Creates an account based on credentials provided by the authenticator instance of another user on the device, who has chosen to share the account with this user.
